text: "Rendez-Vous" is a 1998 song recorded by the German Eurodance band Culture Beat. It was released as the second single from their fourth studio album, Metamorphosis. The song features American singer Kim Sanders. It reached its best chart positions as number 38 in Austria, number 48 in Sweden and number 53 in Germany. ==Track listing== ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== {|class="wikitable sortable" !Chart (1998) !Peak position |- |- |- |- |- |} ==References== Category:1998 singles Category:Culture Beat songs Category:Kim Sanders songs Category:1998 songs Category:Columbia Records singles Category:English-language German songs
title: Rendez-Vous (Culture Beat song)
